original_text: And after the whole nation had been circumcised, they remained where they were in camp until they were healed.
korean_text: 또 그 모든 백성에게 할례 행하기를 마치매 백성이 진중 각 처소에 머물며 낫기를 기다릴 때에

sentences.original_text: And after the whole nation had been circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 민족이 할례를 받은 후에

sentences.original_text: they remained where they were in camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 진영에 있는 그 자리에 머물렀습니다
